backend/main.mo: Main canister implementing access control, user profiles, attendance records, holiday and permission requests using ordered maps and role checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented translation, localization, and domain‑label features with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and Italian‑localized behavior of each frontend component and utility file.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component handling authentication, invite flow, onboarding, profile setup, and rendering the dashboard with Italian i18n.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component with theme toggle, user menu, logout handling, and Italian‑localized labels.
frontend/src/components/HolidayApprovals: Admin interface for viewing, filtering, and approving or rejecting holiday requests with Italian status labels.
frontend/src/components/InviteManagement: Manages invite code generation, copying, and displays statistics and tables for unused, used, and RSVP-related codes.
frontend/src/components/MyAttendance.tsx: Provides UI for recording, editing, and viewing personal attendance records with multiple time views and activity types.
frontend/src/components/MyHolidays.tsx: Lets users submit holiday requests, view monthly filtered requests, and shows remaining holiday balance.
frontend/src/components/MyPermissions.ts: Handles creation and listing of permission requests with date selection, request types, and status badges.
frontend/src/components/OnboardingFlow.t: Guides new users through RSVP submission and profile setup using an invite code across a multi‑step onboarding flow.
frontend/src/components/PermissionApprov: Displays and filters permission requests, allowing admins to approve or reject them with status badges and counters.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal form for creating a user profile with name, position, and role, saving data through a mutation.
frontend/src/components/TeamOverview.tsx: Shows team attendance data by day, week, or month with statistics, navigation, and CSV export options.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login, and logout logic using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating profiles, attendance, permissions, and related backend data.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light/dark themes and applies base border and background/text styles.
frontend/src/lib/attendanceLabels.ts: Provides deprecated wrappers forwarding attendance and activity label helpers to domainLabels.
frontend/src/lib/domainLabels.ts: Maps domain enums to Italian labels and badge variants using the i18n utility.
frontend/src/lib/i18n/index.ts: Implements a simple i18n lookup with interpolation and exports the Italian dictionary.
frontend/src/lib/i18n/it.ts: Contains the full Italian translation dictionary for UI strings.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility functions for class merging and formatting dates in Italian using date-fns.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, InternetIdentityProvider, React Query, and global CSS.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the main dashboard with personal/admin views, tabs, and user-specific data loaded via hooks.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Displays the login page with Internet Identity login, optional invite alert, and feature highlights.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the attendance-management dApp, including schema version, high-level summary, and a list of existing implemented features with IDs and descriptions.
